title: Ultimate Game Music Loops - Electronic
description: This music loop pack houses over 400+ music loop tracks so you can rapidly create content, prototype, test as well as other useful use cases.
longDescription:
Check out the audio demo!


413 files included - The Ultimate Game Music Loops series was created for scaling game developers & producers looking for the best on-budget music loop & soundtrack library. Inside find an extensive catalog of electronic music to choose from in many different energy levels in moods. The music loop pack houses over 400+ music loop tracks so you can rapidly create content, prototype, test as well as other useful use cases.Â All music is 100% royalty-free and can be used for all your music in your videos, social media posts, adverts, website, film, game, you name it!


Multiple Variations Of Each Loop

Most music tracks include full, loop & alt version loops like verse, chorus, bridge so you can truly mix & match how the tracks display. Having different sections of a song will help you control the amount of energy that is needed for a given level, scene, menu screen & more.


Best Budget Game Music Library

The music library is all organized into easy to understand folder structures & all files are labeled with keywords, descriptors, BPM & key tagged. This catalog features some awesome music perfect for content creators, video makers, game devs, & producers.


Upon purchase if you want the full length soundtracks - please reach out to support & we will glady give you access to them. Due to upload/package asset limits - we couldnt add them to this bundle. Price is reflected.
